DOC.brief_summary: Impact contrast dose total volume contrast require effectively treat targeted tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Impact C-arm CT Decreased Renal Function Undergoing TACE Tx Hepato-Cellular Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients must affect HCC 2 . Patients must diminish renal function ( GFR < 60 ml/min/1.73m^2 ) 3 . Patients must 18 year old old 4 . Patients must receive abdominal CT , PET/CT scan MRI , complete prior TACE procedure . 5 . Ability understand willingness sign write informed consent document . 1 . Subjects age 18 2 . Patients currently dialysis 3 . Pregnant woman
